channel.title: Microfire - The offical release [562] VERY STABLE - EXCELLENT BASE*
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/b3vu4k.png[/img]
[i][size=12pt]Microfire is a project I was working on a few months back, seems I have no use for this no more I thought I'd release this to you guys. I GIVE [u]NOBODY[/u] PERMISSION TO RELEASE ANY WHERE ELSE.[/size][/i]
[size=14pt][b]Content:[/b][/size] [size=12pt][i] -> Falador Home -> Fixed some shop glitchs. (buy one item and get a diffrent one) -> Began adding 'members only' features (donator) -> Fixed clipping from yaks to the water.. -> Addedancients/lunar altars. -> Added 'tabbed banking' -> New training area (White knights) found the correct annimations. -> Added Jad, In real area. I'll work on the waves at a later stage. -> Just finished adding 1 click pvp! -> Added Some Runecrafting staff's (dont know the correct name) -> Hand cannon special attack -> Added Overloads. (Still need fixing, But give 125 attack, str ect.) -> Added voting hats ;O. -> Fixed Personal Message glitch (player cant get a crown any more :)) -> Added Quick chat. EDIT: were like the 3rd 562 with quick chat?! -> Added working following; Needs alot more work doing -__- -> Added guilded altar for members, also you need a prayer level of 50 to use. -> Fixed 'Members' Rank. -> Changed prices for items. (e.g rune plate was 0gp.). -> Started writting new npc dialouges. (Mind my spelling >.<) -> Added Economic range shop & Armor shop & Supplies shop & Food shop :). -> Added pots to Food shop -> Changed White Knights in NpcDefinition.XML. -> Added Duel Arena mini-game with Makka. -> Fixed up Trade Screens. -> Working on Quick-Chat too appear for other players, along with the proper image. :p. (not even close to finish.) -> Added a Trade log. -> Added white portal. (needs combat) -> Added red portal. (needs comabt) -> Added the portal to leave both portals. -> Began working on combat inside the portal. Forgot how i did it last time >.< -> Added new 'swords shop' in varrock. *Nothing to much b'cus of the eco*. -> Added all summoning familiers. -> Made all summoning familiers summonable. -> Added Veng other. (Works fine, needs tweaking though). -> Fixed up some summoning familiers.
([u]This was taken from the Update log[/u]) [/i][/size] [size=14pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/iyee7b.png[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/v5e1yw.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/awrngz.png[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/nevx5e.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/25ti345.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/21l8wu9.png[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2aifqz5.png[/img]
[size=36pt]Don't flame about the picture's, yes they have been put on here before...[/size]
[size=24pt][b]Link:[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?1ln5dl8ry7dqbp3]http://www.mediafire.com/?1ln5dl8ry7dqbp3[/url]
Most clients are compatible! [size=36pt]KEEP THIS POST ALIVE, LEAVE A COMMENT![/size]
[/center]

item.title: Microfire - The offical release [562] VERY STABLE - EXCELLENT BASE*
item.dc:creator: @McCauley1 McCauley.
item.description:
@McCauley1 wrote:

RedFalconBlue:

Good job for your first release.

Thanks

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:18, topic:434349”]It’s not bad for a first release.

But don’t make the pictures so big >.>[/quote]
Thanks, I’ll resize the image’s next time.

[quote=“JavaTC, post:8, topic:434349”]Why be so angry about it being released to other places? If you don’t release it, it won’t happen. Also, please don’t use the “it’s my first release” excuse because for all I know you could be a full time game developer.

Other than that, I like it. 562 is my own favorite revision mostly because it has all the features I need in it.[/quote]
It’s not that I would be angry if somebody released it else where, but why should somebody else take credit for my work?
562’s are my favorite revision too:p

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Mystic-Effect, post:13, topic:434349”]GUESS WAT THERE IS 0 STABLE 562 THEY HAVE SO MANY BUGS

gj anyways :P[/quote]
When we say stability, we are pointing towards how many players the server can hold, how well the game engines run, and how well people can play without disconnecting.

Read full topic

item.title: Microfire - The offical release [562] VERY STABLE - EXCELLENT BASE*
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Why be so angry about it being released to other places? If you don’t release it, it won’t happen. Also, please don’t use the “it’s my first release” excuse because for all I know you could be a full time game developer.

Other than that, I like it. 562 is my own favorite revision mostly because it has all the features I need in it.
